title: Sinners entitled 2 Allah's concessions? Combine prayers when travelling 4 zina? Tayammum after zina?
transcript: there are certain conditions in Islam where Allah has given us some relaxations for example like traveling or doing if we don't find water or water is too cold Sheikh my question is let's say for example a person has to go to America or China to attend a music concert hypothetically let's say but he has to stay there for two or three days even though he is sinning so in this situation does these relaxations apply to him for example can he pray the qasar prayer or let's say hypothetically a person commits Zina and then he does not find a water and he does the time so in these cases even if he is doing sin does these relaxation still apply to him the two examples are different someone who committed zinner this is a major sin he is now in the major ritual impurity State doesn't have water it's time for prayer that's a separate thing he has to pray there's no water the concession of offering dry evolution is there for him he has to take it this is separate someone who's traveling with the intention of sinning the majority of Scholars say that he may not take Allah's concessions of traveling because he's traveling is not permissible so if I'm going to a country to fornicate and to party and while going there I'd like to take the concessions of travel a traveler and prays and combined between Assad Etc no this is not permissible because the initial purpose of your travel is Haram and hence this is not permissible and Allah Knows Best
